text.tspan: We believe in providing a distinguished value proposition to players
The current status quo model for P2E-tokenomics is problematic because non-
contributors and bots acquire tokens and cause inflation. Our tokenomics is based on a
tier system, where true contributors to the game economy will get far more credit.
A number of in-game activities will be needed to acquire certain resources in-game,
where you need to train yourself to become more skillful.
We make ecosystems that are enjoyable. DUST80 is designed to thrive on the value of
the growth of our game.
We build games and NFT eco-system that is enjoyable. NO MORE, NO LESS.
Value Proposition
We believe that only a great game has longevity. You play it because you love it, and
in return, you get rewarded. This is a distinction from most P2E games, where great
gameplay is secondary to earning tokens. For this cause, we built sustainable
tokenomics.
We believe in making an eco-system where the players should put money and token to
get the value of “fun” gameplay.
We believe that only a great game has longevity. You play it because you love it, and
in return, you get rewarded. This is a distinction from most P2E games, where great
gameplay is secondary to earning tokens. For this cause, we built sustainable
tokenomics.
We believe in making an eco-system where the players should put money and token to
get the value of “fun” gameplay.
TOKENOMICS
